## rgbToHsl() function

Converts an RGB color to HSL color space.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function rgbToHsl(rgb: RGB): HSL;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

rgb


</td><td>

[RGB](./chromaterm.rgb.md)


</td><td>

RGB color with values 0-255


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[HSL](./chromaterm.hsl.md)

HSL color with h: 0-360, s: 0-1, l: 0-1
